XII.ii.2.C.2.a
.
Certifying Entitlement for the Special Allowance Under 38 U.S.C. 1312(a)
The table below describes the process followed by SSA to certify entitlement for the special allowance under
38 U.S.C. 1312(a)
.
Stage
Description
1
Receives notice of death from the service department.
2
Determines whether there are survivors eligible for the special allowance under
38 U.S.C. 1312(a)
.
Reference
:  For more information on the actions taken by SSA after determining the claimant’s entitlement to the special allowance, see
M21-1, Part XII, Subpart ii, 2.C.2.b
.
3
Takes action as appropriate depending on the eligibility determination.
References
:  For more information on
the appropriate SSA actions after determining eligibility, see
M21-1, Part XII, Subpart ii, 2.C.2.b
, and
reviewing the
VA Form 21P-4180
returned by SSA to determine entitlement or non-entitlement, see
M21-1, Part XII, Subpart ii, 2.C.2.d
.
